name: @n8n/n8n-nodes-langchain.vectorStoreInMemoryInsert
semantic_context: Insert data into an in-memory vector store

notice.displayName: The embbded data are stored in the server memory, so they will be lost when the server is restarted. Additionally, if the amount of data is too large, it may cause the server to crash due to insufficient memory.
notice.name: notice

clearStore.name: clearStore
clearStore.description: Whether to clear the store before inserting new data

memoryKey.name: memoryKey
memoryKey.description: The key to use to store the vector memory in the workflow data. The key will be prefixed with the workflow ID to avoid collisions.
memoryKey.ai_hint: The key to use to store the vector memory in the workflow data. The key will be prefixed with the workflow ID to avoid collisions.
